name: Magical Secrets
trigger: when your Prepared Spells number increases
effects: you can choose any of your new prepared spells from the Bard, Cleric, Druid, or Wizard spell lists
those spells count as Bard spells for you
when you replace a prepared spell, you can replace it with a spell from those lists
